headline: ARK’s Cathie Wood Is Betting on a Crypto Stock Rebound. Here’s What She Bought.
summary: Crypto stocks are on a terrible run but  Cathie Wood is intent on buying the dip.  Wood’s ARK funds loaded up on almost $50 million worth of shares in crypto-exposed companies, including crypto exchange  Coinbase  Ethereum treasury company  Bitmine Immersion Technologies  stablecoin issuer  Circle Internet Group  and CoinDesk owner  Bullish  according to a trade notification Monday.  Coinbase stock fell more than 6%, while Circle tumbled 9.6%, Bitmine plunged 11% and Bullish slipped 2.6%.

headline: The Nasdaq Turns Higher. Risk and Momentum Are Buoying the Market.

headline: Can Robinhood’s 2025 Surge Be Justified After Tripling Despite Volatile Trading?
summary: If you are looking at Robinhood Markets and wondering whether the stock is still worth chasing after its massive run, you are not alone. This article is going to dig into what that price really implies. The share price has been volatile lately, falling around 15.5% over the last week and roughly 5.9% over the past month, but it is still up an eye catching 192.2% year to date and 166.8% over the past year. Those swings are happening against a backdrop of Robinhood rolling out new products and...
